articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction of Power Stations on Chongchon River
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction of Power Stations on Chongchon River
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction of the power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River.
					 He encouraged the builders, looking round various places of the construction site.
					
					 The consultative meeting took place on the spot. The meeting referred to the importance of the construction of power stations and discussed carrying out this year's tasks in the project without fail.
					
					 It took measures to ensure that raw and other materials needed for the project are supplied by relevant units.
					
					 The premier went round the Kujang Cement Factory. He stressed the need to increase the production in order to fully supply cement needed for the above-said project.

articles.title: Soldiers Pledge Revenge on S. Korean Military Hooligans
articles.content:
Soldiers Pledge Revenge on S. Korean Military Hooligans
 Kangryong, April 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting of soldiers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) to vow not to pardon the monstrous atrocities committed by the south Korean puppet military hooligans but to take thousand-fold revenge upon them took place at the Pupho Offshore Farm from where Yonphyong Island is in sight on Friday.
					 It was attended by generals, officers and soldiers of the KPA three services.
					
					 The floor was taken by crewman of the Ongjin Fishery Station Kim Thae Won and its Chief Engineer Kim Chol and KPA service personnel Jang Hyok and Sim Kang Ju.
					
					 They said the shuddering atrocious acts committed by the south Korean military hooligans after intruding into the territorial waters of the DPRK side on March 27 and seizing a peaceable fishing boat enraged all the service personnel of the KPA.
					
					 The crewmen could fight it out against the military hooligans and come back because they were fully confident that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un was looking after them, they said.
					
					 They pledged to turn the citadel of the enemies into the second flaming Yonphyong Island by showering it with shells, once the supreme commander issues an order.
					
					 The monstrous crimes committed by the puppet forces under the blue sky of the motherland can never be pardoned, they stressed, pledging to force the enemies to pay with their death for the crimes they committed by desperately trying to take the crew away from the fold of the supreme commander.
					
					 The meeting heard literary pieces revealing the invariable intention of the puppet group of traitors and denouncing their mediaeval crimes. 
					
					 A resolution of revenge was read out.

articles.title: Moranbong Band Leaves for Samjiyon
articles.content:
Moranbong Band Leaves for Samjiyon
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band left here by air and arrived in Samjiyon on Friday to make a performance tour of Ryanggang Province after successfully winding up its performances here.

articles.title: Moranbong Band Gives Its Premiere in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Moranbong Band Gives Its Premiere in Samjiyon County
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Moranbong Band started its performance tour of Ryanggang Province.
					 It gave its premiere on Friday in Samjiyon County, where Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution, is in sight.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Sang Won, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and other people in the county.
					
					 When the artistes of the band in military uniforms of the anti-Japanese guerrillas put on the stage female solo "O My Motherland Full of Hope", the audience broke into loud applause and warm cheers.
					
					 Put on the stage were female duet and pangchang "Shine, Jong Il Peak", female trio "First Home under Sky" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the revolutionary life of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who wisely led the WPK, army and people of the DPRK for decades after being born as the Shining Star over Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution.
					
					 Presented in succession were songs reflecting the boundless emotion and joy of the people having at the helm of the WPK and revolution Marshal Kim Jong Un who is fully demonstrating the dignity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea before the world to achieve the final victory by carrying on the march started from Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The band's repertoire included songs "We Think of the Marshal Day and Night", "Our Father" and "Warm Feelings" reflecting all people's feelings following the Marshal as the sun of the destiny.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as it was a wonderful combination of unique and dynamic songs, enthusiastic rhythms, skilful presentation of instrumental music, stage background and lighting and stage decor.
					
					 The artistes of the Moranbong Band who were enthusiastically conducting performance activities like the buglers of the anti-Japanese guerrillas greatly encouraged the zeal of the people in Samjiyon County for the revolution and struggle.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Meeting to Start Actions of Information, Agitation Force and Means Held
articles.content:
Meeting to Start Actions of Information, Agitation Force and Means Held
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting to start actions of information and agitation force and means for giving full play to the mental power of the masses took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Friday.
					 Present there were officials in Pyongyang, members of itinerant art squads, agitators, lecturers, publication distributors and anchorpersons.
					
					 Ri Il Hwan, secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un provided an immortal great programme for hastening the final victory through a revolutionary ideological offensive in his speech made at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the WPK.
					
					 All ideological workers should creditably fulfill their revolutionary duties as buglers of the revolution and pacemakers of the era by opening the fire for the ideological campaign for giving full play to the mental power of the masses, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants left for their destinations at the end of the meeting.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by First Secretary V.V. Grishkov left here by air Friday.

articles.title: Posters on April Spring Friendship Art Festival Produced
articles.content:
Posters on April Spring Friendship Art Festival Produced
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK produced posters on the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 A poster depicts female artistes in diverse national costumes holding high the logo of the festival against the background of a globe and has the slogan "Let Us Loudly Sing Song of Independence, Peace and Friendship!" representative of its idea. 
					
					 Among the new posters are those portraying prestigious art troupes and singers, dancers and instrumentalists enthusiastically displaying their high skills and acrobats performing stunts requiring high technique.
					
					 Those posters truthfully represent the stages of the festival on which foreign artistes will sing with profound reverence for the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu for their undying feats for the cause of global independence.

articles.title: 19th Cooking Festival Held in DPRK
articles.content:
19th Cooking Festival Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The 19th Cooking Festival took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House from April 2 to 4 with the approach of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The annual festival was attended by 1,400 cooks, waiters and waitresses selected from more than 50 units across the country. 
					
					 What caught visitors' eyes at the festival were dishes cooked with bullfrog, freshwater lobster and quail dishes which were presented by the Okryu Restaurant.
					
					 The festival was also accompanied with a practical contest and a demonstration cooking. 
					
					 What drew particular attention were the cooking skills for steamed sturgeon, roasted eel and mushroom dishes. 
					
					 The festival included an exhibition of specific cuisines and an exhibition of sci-tech achievements in cooking.
					
					 Kim Yong Il, a department director of the Korean Association of Cooks, told KCNA that the festival served as a good occasion for developing the country's cooking techniques and food culture.

articles.title: Kangso Mineral Water in DPRK
articles.content:
Kangso Mineral Water in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The demand for Kangso mineral water in the DPRK is growing among people.
					 This bottled water containing much HCO?is produced at the Kangso Mineral Water Factory as one of health drinks.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the factory in November Juche 99 (2010) and called for further improving the quality of the mineral water.
					
					 True to his behest and supreme leader Kim Jong Un's intention, the factory has striven for the improvement of water quality.
					
					 Its technicians succeeded in improving the flavor and quality of Kangso mineral water to suit the world's level, through a joint study with researchers of Kim Il Sung University and the State Academy of Sciences. They remodeled the settling processes so as to keep its peculiar flavor for a long time.
					
					 Mineral water is efficacious for liver diseases, fatness, diabetes, digestive trouble, etc.
					
					 The Kangso mineral water won a SGS certification and was appreciated at national exhibitions for its good quality and flavor.

articles.title: U.S. Periodically Renders Situation of Korean Peninsula Strained: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Periodically Renders Situation of Korean Peninsula Strained: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The UN Security Council recently committed an act of "denouncing" the DPRK's justifiable rocket launching drills at the baton of the United States.
					 This is an outrageous deed and a serious challenge to the universal understanding of the international community since the UNSC, which should regard impartiality as its principle of action, sided with the U.S., an assailant who sued the victim.
					
					 Anyone can easily discern the reversed logic, if she or he approaches with unbiased view of the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 In fact, it is none other than the U.S. that has cyclically and intentionally screwed up the situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Now the danger of war comes from the massive shipment of military hardware into south Korea and the ceaseless nuclear war exercises there, the outcome of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 As was known, an atmosphere of detente had prevailed in the Korean Peninsula in recent months, thanks to the goodwill steps taken by the DPRK for regional peace and stability and improved north-south relations.
					
					 But the U.S., displeased with such developments, kicked off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises with the south Korean puppet forces after introducing its huge aggression troops and lethal weapons into south Korea. Worse still, on March 27 they launched the Ssangryong drill, mainly aimed to "occupy Pyongyang," with the largest-ever forces since 1993 involved.
					
					 So, it is quite natural for the DPRK's army to have made full preparations under the prevailing grave situation as its mission is to protect the security of the country and its people and defend peace.
					
					 In particular, the rocket launching of the DPRK was part of the regular self-defensive military drills of its army to cope with the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK that has persisted for decades century after century and its intensified nuclear war games.
					
					 The U.S. defends its joint military exercises in other's land as "regular" while condemning the self-defensive drills of the DPRK army in its land "provocative". Such gangster-like assertion is not workable on anyone.
					
					 The U.S. should not run amuck. If a catastrophic event occurs on the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. will never flee from the responsibility for it.

articles.title: People with Steadfast Class-Consciousness against Imperialism Are Sure to Win: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
People with Steadfast Class-Consciousness against Imperialism Are Sure to Win: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The will of the army and people of the DPRK to carry on the class struggle against imperialism is getting stronger after the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in a statement declared its principled stand on the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 With no class struggle against imperialism the revolution can not advance. The class struggle against imperialism is, in essence, a war of ideology.
					
					 Victory in the class struggle belongs to those strong in mental strength.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the Workers' Party of Korea to heighten to the maximum the anti-imperialist class consciousness among all the service personnel and people, and thus mercilessly smash the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and all the class enemies.
					
					 From the outset, the Korean revolution has victoriously advanced in the arduous class struggle against imperialism.
					
					 Korean socialism is an impregnable fortress which has been defended with the brilliant tradition of the class struggle against imperialism as its roots.
					
					 The militant group capable of playing an important role in the class struggle at the present times is the revolutionary army standing in the forefront of showdown with imperialism, taking hold on arms.
					
					 Much upset by the regular rocket-launching drills of Strategic Force units of the Korean People's Army, the U.S. is committing grave military provocations against the DPRK, resorting to unspeakable invectives against it.
					
					 The more intensive the counterrevolutionary offensive of imperialism gets, the more steadfast the class consciousness of the Korean people gets.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence remains strong. The anti-imperialist class consciousness of the Korean people remains unchanged, either.
					
					 The class position of the DPRK is a cornerstone of victory and prosperity which has been further consolidated under the guidance of the Party and the leader.
					
					 The Party's experience in the drive to heighten the class consciousness among the people teaches that victory in the anti-imperialist class struggle lies in thoroughly applying the principle of Songun.

articles.title: North-South Relations Are Not Plaything of Policy of Confrontation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
North-South Relations Are Not Plaything of Policy of Confrontation: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean relations drawing expectation and attention at home and abroad are facing a serious challenge, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities let human scum who defected to the south commit unpardonable hostile acts of scattering leaflets malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system. And they staged the madcap largest-scale Ssangyong landing drill together with the U.S. in Phohang under the simulated conditions of mounting a preemptive attack on the north, intensifying the Foal Eagle joint military exercises
					
					 Their provocative acts are an open breach of the north-south agreement which had reached with much effort and, at the same time, a reckless act of driving the inter-Korean relations into an extreme phase of confrontation and war crisis once again.
					
					 Their landing drill goes to clearly prove that they opt for military confrontation, not for dialogue.
					
					 The historic agreement that the north and the south shall stop slandering each side at the north-south high-level contact in February aroused a great joy of all Koreans and was warmly welcomed by the international community. 
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities are resorting to more frantic provocation than before the agreement, feigning ignorance of the promise made by them upon the authorization of the chief executive.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations can never be a plaything of the anti-reunification forces turning their back on the aspiration of the nation and the trend of the times.
					
					 The detente and peace on the Korean peninsula and the national reconciliation and unity are not a call of one side only. This is the order of the nation and call of the era.
					
					 Those who follow in the footsteps of traitors, not lending an ear to it, are bound to face a stern judgment of history.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Landing Exercise of U.S., S. Korean Military Warmongers Blasted
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Landing Exercise of U.S., S. Korean Military Warmongers Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Warmongers inside and outside south Korea on March 31 opened to media the large-scale joint landing drill codenamed Ssangyong now under way as part of Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary in this regard: These moves are a blatant challenge to the DPRK making sincere efforts for the improvement of the north-south relations and detente on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The joint landing drill of the U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers is a dangerous saber-rattling aimed at a preemptive attack on the north, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 This year's Ssangyong drill is the largest-ever in history. 
					
					 22 Ospreys of the U.S. forces are involved to test their operational capabilities for the first time in history.
					
					 The past Ssangyong exercises put a main emphasis on infiltration from the sea. However, this year's exercises involve the aerial infiltration operation by Ospreys.
					
					 The largest-ever anti-DPRK landing exercises now under way despite the unanimous denunciation of the public at home and abroad render the situation on the Korean peninsula extremely tense.
					
					 The prevailing grave situation proves that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities never stand for the improvement of the north-south relations and peace but pursue confrontation and war only.
					
					 It is the right to self-defense for the DPRK to resolutely counter the military provocation by the warmongers at home and abroad.

articles.title: Self-defense Is DPRK's Legitimate Exercise of Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Self-defense Is DPRK's Legitimate Exercise of Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The UN Security Council recently committed a provocative act of "denouncing" the DPRK's justifiable rocket launching drills for no reason. This was a wanton violation of international justice. Rodong Sinmun on Friday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the trite method of the U.S. to disarm a sovereign state and overthrow it under the pretext of "defending peace".
					
					 If the UNSC persistently tries to deny the DPRK's legitimate exercise of the right to self-defense pursuant to unreasonable "resolutions" according to the U.S. scenario, away from impartiality, it will only escalate tensions and spark conflict, aggression and war, far from contributing to keeping peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 Peace is very dear for the Korean people. However, it can hardly be achieved by desire or begging.
					
					 Peace can be achieved only when the right to self-defence is exercised.
					
					 This is a bitter lesson taught by human history.
					
					 The farce staged by the U.S. to "denounce" the DPRK's rocket launching drills for no reason after bringing them up for discussion at the UNSC is aimed to divert the blame for escalating tensions to the DPRK.
					
					 As the U.S. persists in its moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK by abusing the UNSC, the DPRK will leave no means untried to exercise the right to self-defense.
					
					 It is the DPRK's mode of retaliation to counter the enemy's dagger with a long sword and their gun with an artillery piece.
					
					 The DPRK's self-defensive military force will remain undeterred by whatever anti-DPRK racket the U.S. may kick up on the UN arena. 
					
					 The U.S. persistent denial of the DPRK's military measures for self-defence would put itself at peril.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ending History of Flunkeyism to U.S. in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ending History of Flunkeyism to U.S. in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an article to the 66th anniversary of the heroic April 3 popular uprising of south Koreans on Jeju Island.
					 Jeju islanders rose up in a popular uprising in Yonbong of Mt. Halla at the dawn of April 3, 1948 in protest against the U.S. imperialists' plot to set up a "separate government".
					
					 The uprising was a righteous anti-U.S. and anti-fascist popular uprising to end the outsiders' domination and subjugation, and a patriotic deed that demonstrated the indomitable will and spirit of the south Koreans to achieve the country's reunification, the article says.
					
					 Calling for putting an end to the shameful history of sycophancy toward the U.S. in south Korea in order to realize the desire of the uprisers, the article goes on:
					
					 A stumbling block lying in the way of the nation's independence and reunification is the U.S. military presence in south Korea. Only when the U.S. imperialist aggression troops are driven out of south Korea and an end is put to the U.S. colonial domination, is it possible to pave a wide avenue for independently carving out the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The struggle for independence against the U.S. is a just cause of ending the outsiders' domination and interference for aggression. The people in south Korea should categorically reject flunkeyism toward the U.S. and dependence on outsiders and wage a patriotic struggle to drive out of it the U.S. imperialist aggression troops, a root cause of all sorts of sufferings and pain inflicted on the nation.
					
					 The article calls on the south Koreans from all walks of life to wage a more dynamic just struggle to put an end to the U.S. moves for domination and interference and to achieve the independent reunification and peace and prosperity by pooling the efforts of the Koreans in the same indomitable fighting spirit and with the same patriotic will as were displayed by the heroic resistance fighters on Jeju Island.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Fascist Action to Stamp Out Chongryon Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Fascist Action to Stamp Out Chongryon Assailed
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Tokyo District Court recently passed an illegal decision of allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Friday brands this as an intolerable fascist action to destabilize and stamp out Chongryon and an intolerable hostile act against the DPRK.
					
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					 Chongryon is a dignified overseas Koreans' organization of the DPRK for safeguarding the legitimate rights of the Koreans in Japan and the Korean Hall is an important center of Chongryon's activities for protecting and ensuring the rights and interests of the Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 Chongryon has played the role of a diplomatic mission representing the DPRK in Japan as there are no diplomatic relations between the two countries. To destabilize and stamp out Chongryon is, in the final analysis, a deliberate act to deteriorate the bilateral relations, a vivid expression of the Japanese reactionaries' hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are vehemently denouncing with towering anger the move of the Japanese authorities to illegally seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon in broad daylight.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities persistently pursue the moves to seize the Korean Hall, not properly understanding the will of the army and people of the DPRK, they will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences.
					
					 They should behave with discretion, clearly understanding that persecution and suppression of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan are an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK and a suicidal act of pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to an irretrievable worst phase.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Warmongers Hold Madcap Anti-DPRK War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Warmongers Hold Madcap Anti-DPRK War Exercises
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The 55th division of the puppet forces staged a nighttime combined drill of a task force on April 1 at a time when the madcap Foal Eagle joint military exercises were under way in south Korea.
					 The exercises were aimed to mobilize units at all levels under the division on a moment's notice under the pretext of coping with the night infiltration and missile launch of someone.
					
					 In the meantime, the second corps of the puppet forces announced they would hold drills of seizing positions, moving tanks and firing shells of artillery pieces in the area of Chunchon and Hwachon of south Korean Kangwon Province in the coordinated operation with police and reserve forces till April 11.
					
					 The warmongers' saber-rattling is further ratcheting up military tension on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Policy for Unification Censured by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Policy for Unification Censured by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a commentary on April 1 in denunciation of the south Korean chief executive's confrontational moves against the DPRK.
					 The commentary said: The policy of "promoting unification" set forth by Park Geun Hye during her overseas trip is, in a word, the policy of discordance of her words and deeds.
					
					 Park is staging military maneuvers though she knows that the north will be opposed to them. This shows that all her policies related to unification are nothing but empty phrases.
					
					 The atmosphere of confrontation is running higher in south Korea in the wake of scattering of anti-DPRK leaflets in the area along the Military Demarcation Line. This proves that the south Korean authorities feign ignorance of the agreement on stopping mud-slinging.
					
					 The improvement of the north-south relations only can ensure peace and stability on the Korean peninsula but the Park's "government" does not want this and has not taken any measure as regards the U.S. military exercises irritating the north.
					
					 The commentary urged the Park's "government" to stop the confrontational moves against the DPRK and defuse the north-south confrontation to find the way of achieving peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 Only when the north-south relations are improved can peace and reunification be achieved, it stressed.

articles.title: Japan's Illegal Decision to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Illegal Decision to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Tuesday issued a statement titled "Japanese authorities should stop at once the moves to crackdown upon and stamp out the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan".
					 The statement noted that the Japanese authorities instigated the Tokyo District Court to make an illegal decision of allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon recently.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 This is touching off bitter indignation among overseas compatriots as it is a premeditated and deliberate action to destabilize and stamp out Chongryon.
					
					 When looking back on history, Japan adopted a hostile policy toward the DPRK as its state policy and has since resorted to ceaseless political suppression and persecution of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The decision of allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon means crackdown upon the Koreans in Japan and a politically-motivated repressive act against all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad.
					
					 Chongryon has performed its noble mission for the DPRK-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia. And the Japanese authorities' decision to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon will not escape strong denunciation by the peoples of the DPRK and Japan and have a serious impact on the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 The headquarters bitterly condemned the Japanese authorities' moves to seize the Koreans Hall of Chongryon and urged them to revoke the illegal decision at once.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Paper Praises DPRK's Socialist Policies
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Paper Praises DPRK's Socialist Policies
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan Thongil on Mar. 27 carried an article on the impressions of the homeland given by Korean artistes after visiting it on the occasion of the birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Those artistes in the article said that they had gotten unforgettable impressions of the homeland, while taking part in the celebrations of the Day of the Shining Star and touring its various parts.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 We say with great admiration that free healthcare and education are the best socialist policies to be envied by everybody.
					
					 The people in the homeland live full of enthusiasm and hope. The clean and beautiful appearance of Pyongyang and the life of the people full of laughter are quite different from the propaganda of the West.
					
					 They said that they had achieved their long-cherished wishes by seeing the reality of the homeland for themselves.
					
					 The development in the homeland and the happy life of the people are ascribable to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
					
					 The paper also carried an article on Munsu Water Park illustrated with photos of people having pleasant rest and those of facilities in the water park under the titles "Endless happy laughter at Munsu Water Park", "It is the Dragon King's Palace, isn't it?" and "Facilities in the outdoor swimming pool making the visitors more delightful".

articles.title: U.S. Policy of Aggression against DPRK Rapped
articles.content:
U.S. Policy of Aggression against DPRK Rapped 
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Ro Kil Nam, representative of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., released an article on Mar. 31 assailing the U.S. provocative policy of aggression.
					 Though they are provocative forces, the U.S. and its followers are labeling the DPRK's act as "provocation", the article said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is, in fact, the only country which used nuclear weapons in human history. The U.S. once threatened to mount a nuclear attack on the north.
					
					 Even at this moment, the U.S. is openly committing provocative acts by staging joint military exercises with the south Korean military.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which made no scruple of committing provocations by escalating military tensions on the Korean peninsula and plugging even Japan, a war criminal state, into its scenario.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the worst force in the world.
					
					 It has obstructed the Korean nation's struggle for reunifying the country independently and peacefully under the banner of the historic North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration and interfered in it.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presented itself, it perpetrated provocations against the DPRK while sowing the seeds of discord between the north and the south. Worse still, it is claiming that only the DPRK should not be allowed to launch satellites though all other countries of the world have the right to launch them freely.
					
					 The U.S. has laid hurdles in the way of the north-south reconciliation and cooperation through intervention and obstructions to the tour of Mt. Kumgang, operations in Kaesong Industrial Park and humanitarian undertakings.
					
					 The U.S. military presence in south Korea is the source of bigger disasters.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should drop their attitude of cooperating with the U.S. in its moves to isolate and stifle their  fellow countrymen in the north in reliance upon it.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Ecuador
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Quito on March 28.
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to praise the exploits of the President on the occasion of Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Highly Praised in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Highly Praised in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Ecuadorian personages praised the exploits of President Kim Il Sung at an inaugural ceremony of the Ecuadorian preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) on March 28.
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 The 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, sun of Juche, who always lives in the hearts of the Korean and world peoples is approaching.
					
					 I recollect with deep emotion the immortal exploits the great persons of Mt. Paektu performed by dedicating their lives to the cause of Juche on the occasion of the significant Day of the Sun.
					
					 The DPRK will always emerge victorious in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle and in the efforts for independence and prosperity as supreme leader Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the cause of Juche, true to the intentions of the preceding leaders.
					
					 Daniel Alvarez Celi, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, noted:
					
					 The Day of the Sun is a holiday not only for the Korean people but for all of us.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a socialist power along with the august name of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dare not provoke the DPRK because the latter has tremendous national power and military muscle provided by the Songun politics.
					
					 We invariably support the Korean people's cause of Juche, the cause of socialism.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Tunisia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Tunisia
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A Tunisian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Tunis on March 29.
					 The secretary general of the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised as Prominent Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised as Prominent Leader
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, released a statement on Mar. 29 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He said the President was an invincible and iron-willed commander and an outstanding leader who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, built powerful socialist Korea and performed immortal exploits for the Korean people's happiness and prosperity and the sacred cause of global independence. 
					
					 He noted Marshal Kim Jong Un, a creditable successor to the cause of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, is wisely leading the party, army and people of the DPRK to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Koreans in their struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country, convinced that the Korean people would surely carry out the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo, Fine Art Exhibitions Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo, Fine Art Exhibitions Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and fine art exhibitions were held in Brazil, Malaysia and Italy from Mar. 5 to 27 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in the exhibitions were photos showing exploits of the President, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also displayed were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing the achievements made by the Korean army and people in building a thriving socialist country and fine art works associated with resourcefulness and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Attending the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions were figures of political parties and organizations and masses of the above-said countries including the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, Confederation of Brazilian Women, Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK and Malaysia-DPRK Friendship Association. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said Kim Il Sung was the benevolent father of the people who had dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country and people's well-being till the last moments of his life since he embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, and an elder statesman of the world who made great contributions to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Malaysia-DPRK Friendship Association praised Kim Il Sung as the sun of the Korean people and a peerlessly great man.
					
					 He noted that Kim Il Sung was deeply revered by the progressive people all over the world as he made great contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence with his outstanding leadership ability and noble virtues.

articles.title: Guinean Figures Urge U.S. to Drop Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Guinean Figures Urge U.S. to Drop Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Guinean figures released statements on March 24 and 26 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK. 
					 Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, said the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the moves pursuant to it are now getting evermore serious. 
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. resorts to its hostile policy toward the DPRK, it will not arrest the DPRK dynamically advancing for the final victory by dint of the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses, he noted, adding:
					
					 The U.S. should totally drop its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and all the measures pursuant to it. 
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for the Korean people led by the great leader HE Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said:
					
					 The statement of the NDC of the DPRK reflects the firm will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to resolutely frustrate the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 We fully support the statement of the NDC of the DPRK, believing that the Korean people vigorously advancing for the final victory under the banner of Songun will frustrate the U.S. hostile policy. 
					
					 The U.S. should discontinue its military threat to the DPRK and stop at once the "human rights" racket, part of the new hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Memorandum of NDC Inspection Team of DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Memorandum of NDC Inspection Team of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on March 27 in support of the memorandum issued by the inspection team of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, four years since the occurrence of the Cheonan warship sinking case. 
					 The statement said that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces misused the warship sinking case for their anti-DPRK moves. 
					
					 The inspection team of the NDC of the DPRK urged the south Korean authorities to meet its three demands, from the standpoint that the truth behind the case should be scientifically and fairly probed to the last, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We fully support the memorandum of the NDC inspection team of the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once anti-DPRK plots as regards the Cheonan warship sinking case.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de planta hidroelectrica de rio Chongchon
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de planta hidroelectrica de rio Chongchon
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, analizo en el terreno el estado de construccion de la planta hidroelectrica escalonada del rio Chongchon.
					 Dando vueltas por varios lugares del campo de construccion, estimulo a los constructores. 
					
					En la reunion consultiva sostenida en el terreno se dio enfasis a la importancia de la construccion  de la planta y se abordaron los temas para cumplir satisfactoriamente las tareas de obra de este ano. 
					
					Y se tomaron medidas para que las unidades concernientes suministren los materiales y materias primas necesarias a la obra. 
					
					Por otra parte, el premier recorrio la Fabrica de Cemento de Kujang, ocasion en la cual subrayo la necesidad de satisfacer el cemento necesario a la construccion de la planta mencionada al incrementar su produccion.

articles.title: Banda Moranbong arriba a Samjiyon
articles.content:
Banda Moranbong arriba a Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Concluida su funcion en esta capital, la Banda Moranbong dio inicio a la gira artistica por la provincia de Ryanggang.
					El dia 4, la banda partio de esta capital por via aerea y arribo a Samjiyon.

articles.title: Banda Moranbong estrena su funcion en el distrito de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Banda Moranbong estrena su funcion en el distrito de Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Las artistas de la Banda Moranbong ofrecieron el dia 4 la primera funcion de su gira por la provincia de Ryanggang en el distrito de Samjiyon con vistas al Paektu, monte sagrado de la revolucion.
					La vieron el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la citada provincia, Ri Sang Won, los funcionarios y los trabajadores de diversos estratos del distrito.
					
					En la escena se pusieron el solo femenino "Mi patria llena de esperanzas", el duo femenino y pangchang "Brilla, pico Jong Il", el trio femenino "Primera casa bajo el cielo" y otras piezas.
					
					Las ejecutantes elogiaron en tono patetico la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien nacido como Estrella Luz del Paektu en el monte sagrado de la revolucion, dirigio sabiamente por varias decadas el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					En las canciones "Siempre pensamos en el Mariscal", "Nuestro padre" y otras, las cantantes describieron la emocion y el jubilo del pueblo por haber enaltecido al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien con pasos firmes hacia la victoria final ostenta la dignidad de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il dando continuidad a la marcha iniciada en el Paektu, al puesto supremo del PTC y la revolucion.
					
					La funcion fue aplaudida por los espectadores por su vivida y dinamica descripcion, el ritmo apasionado, el fondo, el alumbrado y los aparatos escenicos y otros.
					
					Las artistas de la Banda Moranbong, quienes desarrollan las actividades de funcion como los trompeteros de la guerrilla antijaponesa, estimularon mas al entusiasmo revolucionario y al espiritu combativo de los habitantes del distrito de Samjiyon. 
					
					Continua la funcion.

articles.title: Efectuado acto de movilizacion de fuerzas y medios de propaganda
articles.content:
Efectuado acto de movilizacion de fuerzas y medios de propaganda
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la capitalina Plaza Kim Il Sung el acto de movilizacion de las fuerzas y medios de propaganda y agitacion para estimular la potencial espiritual de las masas.
					Estuvieron presentes aqui los funcionarios, los miembros del grupo artistico de agitacion movil, los agitadores, los conferenciantes, los distribuidores de publicaciones y locutores de esta capital.
					
					En la ocasion, hubo discursos tras las palabras de Ri Il Hwan, secretario del Comite del Partido Trabajo de Corea en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un presento, en su discurso pronunciado en la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC, el gran programa para anticipar la victoria definitiva con una ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria.
					
					Y exhorto a todos funcionarios ideologicos a abrir el canonazo de la batalla ideologica, guardando en el corazon el noble espiritu del Mariscal para estimular la facultad espiritual de las masas y cumplir con su obligacion revolucionaria como trompetero de la revolucion y conductor de la epoca.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes partieron hacia los lugares donde libraran las actividades de propaganda y agitacion.
